title: Teapot
description: nearly flat foot; cylindrical shaped, with shoulder near mouth; long, nearly straight spout; double intertwined handle; cover has knob shaped like pinecone in gold with gold leaves; decorated on each side with shield with standing gold bird surmounted by pair of birds, surrounded by swags and tassels; blue and gold bands around bottom and edge of rim; blue berries and gold leaves at termination of each strand of handle; for the American market
